# Abstract

# Introduction

The objective of this paper is to construct at least three predictive models that takes a sentence of text as input and return a prediction of which president was the source of the that sentence. The dataset that will be used is the State of the Nation Address of the President of South Africa (SONA). The dataset contains speeches of all the SONA from 1994 to 2022.
